chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
i: nat
f: nat -> nat

Goal:
i < n -> ∑ (S n) f = f i + f n + ∑ i f + ∑ (n - S i) (fun j : nat => f (S i + j))

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
sum_0n_mono : forall (n : nat) (f g : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i <= g i) -> ∑ n f <= ∑ n g
sum_0n_scal_r : forall (n k : nat) (f : nat -> nat), ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * k) = ∑ n f * k
sum_0n_scal_l : forall (n k : nat) (f : nat -> nat), ∑ n (fun i : nat => k * f i) = k * ∑ n f
sum_0n_le_one : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (i : nat), i < n -> f i <= ∑ n f
sum_power_lt : forall (k n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), k <> 0 -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < k) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * mscal Init.Nat.mul 1 i k) < mscal Init.Nat.mul 1 n k
Newton_nat : forall a b n : nat, mscal Init.Nat.mul 1 n (a + b) = ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => binomial.binomial n i * mscal Init.Nat.mul 1 (n - i) a * mscal Init.Nat.mul 1 i b)
Newton_nat_S : forall a n : nat, mscal Init.Nat.mul 1 n (1 + a) = ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => binomial.binomial n i * mscal Init.Nat.mul 1 i a)
msum_only_one : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X) (i : nat), i < n -> (forall j : nat, j < n -> i <> j -> f j = u) -> msum m u n f = f i
msum_ends : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, 0 < i <= n -> f i = u) -> msum m u (n + 2) f = m (f 0) (f (S n))
msum_ext : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (n : nat) (f g : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = g i) -> msum m u n f = msum m u n g
msum_of_unit : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i = u) -> msum m u n f = u
sum_fold_map : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), ∑ n f = fold_right Init.Nat.add 0 (map f (list_an 0 n))
msum_plus : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (a b : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum m u (a + b) f = m (msum m u a f) (msum m u b (fun i : nat => f (a + i)))
msum_first_two : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), 2 <= n -> (forall i : nat, 2 <= i -> f i = u) -> msum m u n f = m (f 0) (f 1)
msum_msum : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n k : nat) (f : nat -> nat -> X), (forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, i1 < n -> j1 < k -> i2 < n -> j2 < k -> m (f i1 j1) (f i2 j2) = m (f i2 j2) (f i1 j1)) -> msum m u n (fun i : nat => msum m u k (f i)) = msum m u k (fun j : nat => msum m u n (fun i : nat => f i j))
msum_S : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum m u (S n) f = m (f 0) (msum m u n (fun n0 : nat => f (S n0)))
msum_sum : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f g : nat -> X), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> m (f j) (g i) = m (g i) (f j)) -> msum m u n (fun i : nat => m (f i) (g i)) = m (msum m u n f) (msum m u n g)
msum_mscal : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n k : nat) (f : nat -> X), (forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> m (f i) (f j) = m (f j) (f i)) -> msum m u n (fun i : nat => mscal m u k (f i)) = mscal m u k (msum m u n f)
Nat.eqf = fun f g : nat -> bool => forall n : nat, f n = g n : (nat -> bool) -> (nat -> bool) -> Prop Arguments Nat.eqf (_ _)%function_scope
VectorDef.trunc : forall p : nat, ?n > p -> VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> VectorDef.t ?A (?n - p) where ?A : [i : nat n : nat f : nat -> nat |- Type] ?n : [i : nat n : nat f : nat -> nat |- nat]
msum_plus1 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum m u (S n) f = m (msum m u n f) (f n)
msum_1 : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall f : nat -> X, msum m u 1 f = f 0
msum_fold_map : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), msum m u n f = fold_right m u (map f (list_an 0 n))
msum_comm : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall (a : X) (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), (forall i : nat, i < n -> m (f i) a = m a (f i)) -> m (msum m u n f) a = m a (msum m u n f)
binomial.binomial_SS : forall n p : nat, binomial.binomial (S n) (S p) = binomial.binomial n p + binomial.binomial n (S p)
binomial_Newton : forall (X : Type) (sum times : X -> X -> X) (zero one : X), monoid_theory sum zero -> (forall x y : X, sum x y = sum y x) -> (forall x u v : X, sum x u = sum x v -> u = v) -> monoid_theory times one -> (forall x y z : X, times x (sum y z) = sum (times x y) (times x z)) -> (forall x y z : X, times (sum y z) x = sum (times y x) (times z x)) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : X), times a b = times b a -> mscal times one n (sum a b) = msum sum zero (S n) (fun i : nat => mscal sum zero (binomial.binomial n i) (times (mscal times one (n - i) a) (mscal times one i b)))
binomial.binomial = fix binomial (n p : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => match p with | 0 => 1 | S _ => 0 end | S n0 => match p with | 0 => 1 | S p0 => binomial n0 p0 + binomial n0 (S p0) end end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments binomial.binomial (_ _)%nat_scope
Init.Nat.mul = fix mul (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => 0 | S p => m + mul p m end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.mul (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.add_sub_assoc : forall n m p : nat, p <= m -> n + (m - p) = n + m - p
Nat.add_succ_l : forall n m : nat, S n + m = S (n + m)

```coq
```coq
induction i using nat_ind; intros; simpl in *.
* rewrite Newton_nat; simpl; ring_simplify.
  assert (forall k : nat, k <= i -> mscal Init.Nat.mul 1 k (f (S i + k)) = f (S i + k)).
  {
    intro k; elim (Nat.leb_spec k i); clear i; intro Hle.
    - assert (k = i) by omega; subst k; rewrite Newton_nat_S; simpl; ring_simplify.
    - assert (k < i) by omega; intro Hlt.
      rewrite Newton_nat; simpl; ring_simplify.
  }
  rewrite H; simpl; ring_simplify.
* rewrite Newton_nat; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite msum_S; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite IHi; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite sum_0n_mono; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite sum_0n_scal_l; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite sum_0n_scal_r; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite msum_mscal; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite msum_plus; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite Newton_nat_S; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite msum_S; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite IHi; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite msum_mscal; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite msum_plus; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite msum_sum; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite msum_comm; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite Newton_nat; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite msum_S; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite IHi; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite msum_mscal; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite msum_plus; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite msum_sum; simpl; ring_simplify.
  rewrite msum_comm; simpl; ring_simplify.
Qed.```
